name: AHUD

bLostFocusPaused: Tells whether the game was paused due to lost focus
bShowHUD: Whether or not the HUD should be drawn.
bShowDebugInfo: If true, current ViewTarget shows debug information using its DisplayDebug().
bShowHitBoxDebugInfo: If true, show hitbox debugging info.

methods.doc: Transforms a 2D screen location into a 3D location and direction

GetActorsInSelectionRectangle

methods.doc: Returns the Pawn for this HUD's player.

methods.name: GetOwningPlayerController
methods.doc: Returns the PlayerController for this HUD's player.

methods.name: GetTextSize
Project
DrawHUD
methods.doc:
Hook to allow blueprints to do custom HUD drawing. @see bSuppressNativeHUD to control HUD drawing in base class.
Note:  the canvas resource used for drawing is only valid during this event, it will not be valid if drawing functions are called later (e.g. after a Delay node).

methods.name: HitBoxBeginCursorOver
methods.doc: Called when a hit box is moused over.

methods.name: HitBoxClick
methods.doc: Called when a hit box is clicked on. Provides the name associated with that box.

methods.name: HitBoxEndCursorOver
methods.doc: Called when a hit box no longer has the mouse over it.

methods.name: HitBoxRelease
methods.doc: Called when a hit box is unclicked. Provides the name associated with that box.

methods.name: RemoveAllDebugStrings
methods.doc: Remove all debug strings added via AddDebugText
